content: I owned a restaurant in Connecticut , my wife and I had no idea the grand opening would turn into this instant success , we made a profit the first month the doors opened and loyal customers ate and drank for over a decade, how could that be?Well in Connecticut people discovered what now would be considered primitive by today’s standards did you guess? CB radios and we were on the cusp of a phenom everyone seemed to have one and those without cars had table top base units right there at home I owe so much to this wonderful advertisement tool I could really understand now how we love our cell phones so much
